column.name: entry_ids
column.label: Entry IDs
column.suffix: Entry ids to link to. One per line. Can follow search. wiki entries syntax

column.name: timedelay
column.label: Age
column.suffix: Find files that haven't changed in this time (minutes)

column.name: includepattern
column.label: Match files with patterns
column.suffix:
wildcard or "regexp:pattern". One per line. e.g.
*.nc
regexp:model[0-9]\.grb$
To match directories add a "dir" prefix:
dir:*data

column.name: directory_type
column.label: Directory Type
column.suffix: Entry type to use for directories. Note: If you change this then you should also clear the cache with the Admin->Maintenance->Clear Cache

column.name: naming
column.label: Naming
column.suffix:
pattern:replacement e.g.
NAM:North American Model
path:GFS:Global Forecast Model

column.name: pattern
column.suffix: Only show files that match this pattern
column.label: File Pattern

column.name: sheets
column.label: Sheets
column.suffix: Comma separated list of sheet numbers to show (zeroty based)

column.name: skiprows
column.label: Skip Rows
column.suffix: How many rows to remove from the data

column.name: skipcolumns
column.label: Skip columns
column.suffix: How many columns to remove from the data

column.name: header
column.label: Header
column.suffix: Comma separated list of column header labels

column.name: widths
column.label: Column widths
column.suffix: Comma separated list of column widths

column.name: charts
column.label: Default charts
column.suffix:
Specify 1 or more default charts:
type=linechart|barchart|scatterplot, xAxisIndex=0, yAxisIndex=1, sheet=0, ...
...
